page.title: 02A Very Special Day
page.content: { {Mr and Mrs Clowes of Hineswood Farm, Dane in Shaw who were married in 1925 have just celebrated their 60th Wedding Anniversary.Mr.Charles Clowes was born at Ipstones near Leek,Staffs. Mr.and Mrs.Clowes were married at St. Michaels Church,Stramshall near Uttoxeter.After they married they lived on a farm at Gratwick near Uttoxeter then moved to Higher Overton at Timbersbrook.In 1934 they moved to Hineswood Farm and built it 'from scratch'.Mr.Clowes is now 88yrs.and his wife is 82yrs.Mr.Clowes was in the Artillery during the First World War and he served in France.He was badly injured.His eyesight is now failing but he still gets around.His daughter and son in law now run the farm.Many friends joined their celebration.Mr. and Mrs.Clowes still enjoy life.
